channel.title: Coords
channel.description:
Okay, Well. I am going to put in a small portal, so when you click on it, it Teleports to you a mining area. I was wondering, How do i set the Coords of where it sends you to?
Thankyou.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2009, 01:09:11 am[/size][hr]Can someone help me?
All i need to know is, how to set the Coords for where a Magic Portal takes you

item.title: Coords
item.dc:creator: @Hunter_74 Hunter_74
item.description:
@Hunter_74 wrote:

uh, i have this?

It was in something called object.java

public class Object {
public int id, x, y, type;

public Object(int id, int x, int y, int type) {
	this.id = ;
	this.x = x;
	this.y = y;
	this.type = type;
}

}

Read full topic

item.title: Coords
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Search for it. look for objectclick or something like that or you can search up 2213 or another bank ID to find the objectclick packet

Read full topic

item.title: Coords
item.dc:creator: @Hunter_74 Hunter_74
item.description:
@Hunter_74 wrote:

Here is the MakeGlobalObject;
makeGlobalObject(2615, 3082, 2465, 3, 10); Teleport to Area.
makeGlobalObject(3298, 3318, 2465, 3, 10); Teleport back from Area, to where you teleported from.

So the ID is; 2465[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2009, 01:35:42 am[/size][hr]so where is object clicking packet?

Read full topic

item.title: Coords
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You need to add a case in your object clicking packet.

case ####: (#### is the portals ID)
TeleportX (your Teleport X method)
TeleportY (your Teleport Y method)
Send message ( send then a message if you want)
break; add this after and your done

Read full topic

item.title: Coords
item.dc:creator: @Hunter_74 Hunter_74
item.description:
@Hunter_74 wrote:

I added the Portals into Client.Java

I don’t understand how to set up the TeleportToX and stuff.
Like where do i put it, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Coords
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

teleportToX = ####;
teleportToY = ####;

If you’re methods are toX and toY, then use those. Add those codes into your case that involves clicking on the portal.

Read full topic
